CustomField.formula: IF(Most_Knowledgeable_Tech__c<>null, "HEADS UP! It's your first time servicing this customer. Call tech " & Most_Knowledgeable_Tech__r.FirstName &" "&Most_Knowledgeable_Tech__r.LastName & " "&Most_Knowledgeable_Tech__r.Phone& " before servicing." , "")
CustomField.label: First Time Visit Message
